device it needed to include all the software including the operating system
everything preloaded on the platform the folks that we were looking to deploy these we're going to deploy a great

some fairly simple processes for them and at the very end everybody was kind of pushing this network Black Box
approach to security um where kind of the security by obscurity process of the
physical device I'm not sure how much I actually buy into that part but uh we
did add that into the description of what an appliance is we learned a lot about the evolution
of these products they started out as firewall features that got added into original series routers and that all
started with basic packet filtering looking at packet content based upon Source destination and
protocol and over the next 6 months to a year as those router products began to
grow and evolve uh folks started to Ed application specific proxies into those
devices and from there someone came out with the concept of stateful inspection and uh that stuff was added
and that eventually grew into the appliance firewall as you see it and know it
today as far as what technologies they employ without exception almost all of
them are based upon the basic premise of network addas translation or
not uh we found in cases of some of the firewalls this was not even an option
you couldn't disable network adet translation uh so as it is the basis of
their security and protection mechanisms uh much of it was actually integrated
into the device the majority of them that are on the market use packet filtering roles to
determine whether or not packets gain access to the uh internal protected
Network some do use stateful inspection to manage those connections for those of you who aren't
familiar with what stateful inspection is it's basically a dynamic table built into the devices memory it maintains a
process of gathering and monitoring connections that are active and only allowing packets that respond to
originated or uh enduring living sessions uh so that's kind of what in
stateful inspection is in in the summary some of them did include application
proxy support uh a few of them and they got bonus points for this allow allowed
you to create custom proxies of your own choosing many of them only included basic services such as uh HTTP FTP and
while that was sprayed for small companies invariably as as security administrators and firewall
administrators know the day you deploy those devices that don't include real audio in that meeting that's the day the
management edict comes down that that has to happen in the next 30 days the uh CIO usually has something he has to do
the net meet about there were some other helpful
features that we kind of didn't feel were super necessary but uh that we thought might be kind of good to have

server and an FTP server all the more points all the more great reason to use it DHCP support with the growth of cable
modems and other devices that rely upon Network addressing uh being Dynamic it just made sense to us that the external
interfaces on the firewalls should support DHCP unfortunately many of them
do not uh and that kind of left us a little wondering some of them do include
internal DHCP servers which was a very nice feature uh for those folks who were using those
devices we wanted built-in VPN capability although like I said this really wasn't uh a deal killer so to

coming out of this process we really wanted strong authentication support uh the ability to
really challenge in response or use some type of uh strong authentication method for the
users we kind of talked about URL and content blocking we didn't again see

third interface to be uh where you would place a server farm for semi-trusted

support uh we had some client some clients who were uh they were dying to

as the cable that they shipped it with got cut uh and some of the wires were

goal to locate an appliance firewall that could protect our mediumsized business and we approximated 500 users
now that was across the board wide uh not so much on per firewall basis some
of these will support 500 users some of them uh quite frankly had some problems supporting 50 users so be very careful
and aware of uh what those user bases that are out there today are using we were looking for ease of

were looking for are manufacturing uh companies so this type of solution is
not something I would recommend for you if you have financial data or high priority data that you need to protect
uh this is definitely for folks who are not going to be doing Mission critical
or protecting uh infrastructure type of
information we wanted to allow access to our mail and web servers if it wasn't included on the device we wanted to be

want it to be alerted pretty simple pretty simple firewall rules would see
um exactly what a firewall was supposed to do as usual once we got all this stuff

than what we consider to be a firewall uh some performed only natat with no

that was difficult to use or clui at best it always seemed like the thing
